name: confusion
description: This is a website for Ristorante Con Fusion

scripts.usemin: usemin contactus.html -d distribution --htmlmin -o distribution/contactus.html && usemin aboutus.html -d distribution --htmlmin -o distribution/aboutus.html && usemin index.html -d distribution --htmlmin -o distribution/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfonts && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
